hero.title: Recipe Pixie
hero.subtitle: Your magical recipe collection ‚Äì from anywhere, powered by AI

whatIs.title: What is Recipe Pixie?
whatIs.description: Recipe Pixie is your personal AI-powered recipe collection. Save recipes from any website with just one click, organize them intelligently, and let AI help you ‚Äì whether shopping, meal planning, or cooking.

aiParser.title: 1. üß† AI Parser ‚Äì Every Recipe, Every Source
aiParser.description: Simply add a link ‚Äì Recipe Pixie automatically detects all ingredients, steps, and cooking times. Works with virtually any recipe website worldwide.

smartOrganization.title: 2. üìÇ Smart Organization
smartOrganization.description: Create folders, add tags, and find the right recipe instantly ‚Äì by ingredient, cooking time, or occasion.

shoppingList.title: 3. üõí Shopping List in Seconds
shoppingList.description: Select multiple recipes, and Recipe Pixie automatically generates a combined shopping list. Perfect for weekly planning.

mealPlanning.title: 4. üìÖ Meal Planning & Calendar
mealPlanning.description: Plan your week ahead: Drag and drop recipes into your personal meal calendar.

aiAssistant.title: 5. üí¨ AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Ask questions like 'What can I cook with tomatoes and mozzarella?' or 'How do I substitute eggs in this recipe?' ‚Äì AI helps instantly.

multiDevice.title: 6. üì± Available Everywhere
multiDevice.description: Web app, mobile-optimized ‚Äì your recipes are synced across all devices.

communitySharing.title: 7. üåç Community & Sharing
communitySharing.description: Share your favorite recipes with friends or discover new recipes from the Recipe Pixie community.

perfectFor.title: Perfect for:
perfectFor.hobbyChefs: üç≥ Hobby chefs who want to organize their recipe collection
perfectFor.healthConscious: üå± People with specific dietary goals (vegan, gluten-free, low carb...)

user1.quote: Finally, I have all my favorite recipes in one place! The AI parser works incredibly well.
user1.author: Sarah M.

user2.quote: The shopping list feature saves me hours every week. Absolutely recommended!
user2.author: Tom K.

user3.quote: As a vegan, it was often tedious to adapt recipes. The AI assistant makes it super easy!

hero.title: Captain's Log
hero.subtitle: Your modern digital logbook for relaxed sailing. Record courses, sails, weather and wind, track your route via GPS tracking and export professional PDF reports ‚Äì all offline-capable and multilingual.

whatIs.title: What is Captain's Log?
whatIs.description: Captain's Log is the modern solution for your maritime logbook. The web app combines traditional logbook keeping with digital technology and makes documenting your sailing trips easier than ever before.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for professional logbook keeping

voyageManagement.title: ‚öìÔ∏è Voyage Management
voyageManagement.description: Create, edit and track all your trips with start/destination port, date and status

gpsTracking.title: üß≠ Live GPS Tracking
gpsTracking.description: Automatically record your route ‚Äì with speed, course and precise distance calculation

timeline.title: üìç Detailed Timeline
timeline.description: Capture all important events ‚Äì course changes, sail configuration, weather changes, notes

sailConfig.title: ‚õµ Sail Configuration
sailConfig.description: Document mainsail, reef levels, headsail (jib/genoa) and spinnaker deployment

weather.title: üåä Weather & Navigation
weather.description: Record wind (direction & strength), weather, sea state and visibility

pdfExport.title: üìÑ PDF Export
pdfExport.description: Generate professional voyage reports with map, timeline and all details ‚Äì perfect for ship's log

anchorWatch.title: üîî GPS Anchor Watch
anchorWatch.description: Monitor your anchor position with adjustable radius and automatic alarm

offline.title: üåç Offline-Ready & Multilingual
offline.description: Works without internet connection (PWA-capable). Available in German, English, Spanish and French

perfectFor.title: Perfect for
perfectFor.hobbySkippers: üß≠ Hobby sailors and skippers who appreciate professional documentation
perfectFor.sailingSchools: ‚õµ Sailing schools for training voyages and education
perfectFor.documentation: üìù Anyone who wants to record their sailing experiences in a structured way

techStack.title: Technical Details
techStack.description: Fullstack Progressive Web App (PWA) built with React, TypeScript, Leaflet Maps and Lovable Cloud (Supabase). Features: Real-time GPS tracking with Geolocation API, PDF generation (pdf-lib), realtime updates, RLS-secured database, multilingual i18n support, responsive design with Tailwind CSS.

cta.inDevelopment: This app is currently in development. Stay informed about the launch!

hero.title: ContentChef
hero.subtitle: The ultimate content management platform for food creators, food bloggers and food brands

whatIs.title: What is ContentChef?
whatIs.description: ContentChef is an all-in-one content management platform for food creators, food bloggers and food brands who want to create social media content around recipes.

aiContent.title: ü§ñ AI-powered Content Creation
aiContent.description: Automatic generation of posts from recipes. Social media text creation in seconds.

multiPlatform.title: üìÖ Multi-Platform Scheduling
multiPlatform.description: Instagram & Facebook integration. Content calendar with automatic planning.

recipeImport.title: ‚ö° Content Import
recipeImport.description: Quick import of recipes, ideas or content. Direct conversion to social media posts.
